snippet.title: Steven Keating
snippet.description:
Steven Keating (@stevenkeating) Grad student. MIT Engineering/Media Lab. Fan of ideas, optimism, and curiosity. Opponent of ignorance and apathy. Enjoys April Fools' Day far too much. Location: Cambridge, MA Joined twitter: January 20th, 2009 Web: http://t.co/hRxmtxRHfL
459 followers
390 following
1,433 updates
